features: External padded and water-resistant compartment that fits up to a 15" laptop
Two-zipper drop-front opening makes it quick and easy to pack and access all your gear
Top handle makes it easy to hang anywhere
Internal foam shell keeps the bag's shape whether you are carrying a lot or a little
Adjustable padded straps lined with breathable mesh fabric to keep you cool
Removable chest strap to ensure shoulder straps stay where you want them
Internal mesh pockets allow for wet gear to breathe
Internal stretch mesh pocket with zipper closure, adapting to fit the majority of your gear
Two internal stretch mesh side pockets perfect for water bottles or other small items
Hidden exterior pocket for quick access to important items.
